data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On November 11, 2022
data.news_body:
We wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today approved the Un-Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) of the Company for the quarter & half year ended on September 30, 2022.

Pursuant to Regulation 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we enclose the following:

a) Statement showing the Un-Audited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) of the Company for the quarter & half year ended on September 30, 2022 as Annexure-A and

b) Unaudited Segment-wise Revenue, Results, Assets and Liabilities of the Company, both Standalone and Consolidated, for the quarter & half year ended on September 30, 2022; as Annexure-B and

c) Limited Review Report from Rai Qimat & Associates, chartered Accountant on the Un- Audited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) as Annexure-C

The meeting of the Board of Directors commenced 04.15 p.m. and concluded at 05.30 p.m.
